summary: Completed testing of memo/destination tag support for XRP and RLUSD currencies in DynoPay crypto payment UI. Frontend code implementation verified, but backend API integration blocking full testing.

critical_bugs.impact: Blocks crypto currency selection in frontend
Blocks payment creation and memo generation

compilation_issues.issue: TypeScript parsing error on PaymentStatusType definition

integration_issues.issue: Cannot load XRP/RLUSD options due to backend API failures

passed_tests: CryptoDetails interface includes optional memo field (line 203)
handleCopyMemo function exists and properly implemented (lines 543-557)
Memo UI section has correct data-testid attributes (memo-label, memo-value-box, memo-value, copy-memo-btn)
Memo display conditional rendering logic implemented (line 1968)
Failed state reset includes memo field reset (line 375)
Crypto icons (SOL, XRP, POLYGON, RLUSD) properly imported and available
No console errors in frontend logs during navigation

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (8/9 requirements verified, blocked by backend APIs)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Implement missing backend API endpoints (/pay/configured-currencies, /pay/getCurrencyRates, /pay/addPayment) to enable full memo/destination tag testing. These APIs should return mock data including XRP and RLUSD currencies with memo field support. Fix TypeScript compilation error in cryptoTransfer.tsx line 54.
